inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: aunt, brother and mother have the same disease

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: no anemia, infection, diabetes mellitus, malignancy, liver and renal disorder

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: no glucocorticoids, dopamine or dobutamine, amiodarone, lithium, interferons, alemtuzumab

notes: Patient has Hashimoto's thyroiditis and a family history of the disease. She is overweight but her symptoms improved with Levothyroxine treatment.
